desc: Draws a polygon on the screen.

args.name: x1
args.desc: The x position of the first vertex of the polygon.

args.name: y1
args.desc: The y position of the first vertex of the polygon.

args.name: x2
args.desc: The x position of the second vertex of the polygon.

args.name: y2
args.desc: The y position of the second vertex of the polygon.

args.name: x3
args.desc: The x position of the third vertex of the polygon.

args.name: y3
args.desc: The y position of the third vertex of the polygon.
Any other vertices of the polygon.

args.name: color
args.desc: The color of the polygon (0-15), defaults to the active color.
